text: The UK makes a phone call to happy boy on ridilin Trudeau & says “ please help take sone of the white helmets & Trudeau say yes honey we will take your UK & Saudi backed terrorist. Trudeau call T May & asks that she intervene to cool down the Saudi prince but she does nothing!

text: It’s just one misstep after another for teacher turned prime minister J Trudeau, & his sidekick journalist turned foreign minister C. Freeland, both on happy pills & ridilin, & both making one bad decision after another. They live in a liberal fantasyland much like our CNN folks.
